entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Broadview
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Broadview 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: ENE 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
